file_results.false_positive_reason: The code uses pyperclip.copy(res) to optionally copy the generated directory structure (as a string) to the clipboard, based on a user-supplied command-line flag (--clipboard/--no-clipboard). This is a common and benign feature in CLI tools to improve usability. There is no evidence of exfiltration, data theft, or other malicious intent. The clipboard access is user-controlled and only copies the output generated by the tool itself.

detection_points.full_match: * This package accesses the clipboard, which can indicate it's trying to steal sensitive data or overwrite cryptocurrency addresses at mdtree_py-0.1.0/mdtree/__main__.py:64
